short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Kills popups that get past your adblocker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make intrusive popups a thing of the past with Popup Sniper.

Why choose Popup Sniper?
Operates even on sites that restrict adblockers: Some websites can detect and block standard adblockers, but not Popup Sniper.
Superior blocking: Stops popups that bypass standard browser security and adblockers.

Getting Started:
Activate Popup Sniper.
Click the + icon to blacklist troublesome URLs. From then on, any popups from these sites will be blocked!

The Issue:
Ever been abruptly interrupted by popups, even with an adblocker on? Worse, ever been told to disable your adblocker to view content? Popup Sniper is here to tackle both problems head-on.

How Popup Sniper Works:
Instead of just blocking popups, Popup Sniper employs a crafty method. It permits the popup to open, then instantaneously shuts it down. This ensures the ad never gets the chance to disrupt your browsing.

Features:
Blacklist and Chill: With our user-friendly blacklist feature, you decide which sites get the green light and which ones are shut down. Add sites with ease and watch those popups disappear.
Quick Toggle: Turn Popup Sniper on or off with a keyboard shortcut - Ctrl + Shift + Z.
Stay Informed: Get notifications every time a popup is blocked.
Celebrate Your Wins: Keep track of all the popups you've stopped with our counter.

Popup Sniper isn't just another adblocker; it's the protector of your uninterrupted online journey. Say goodbye to intrusive ads and hello to peace of mind online!
